CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 17, 1956, pg. A27, reads: "At Hurricane - The new Cleveland Lyons Trio, featuring Grassella Oliphant, left, on drums; Lyons, on organ, and Al Dobbins on sax, is currently appearing at the Hurricane Club on Centre Ave., where they have broken all records and are being held over an extra week. They recently signed to record with RCA Victor.  Oliphant was formerly with Milt Buckner; Dobbins was with Tiny Bradshaw. - Harris Photo. (Adv't)."
TitMainTitle: Cleveland Lyons Trio, including Grassella Oliphant on drums, Cleveland Lyons on organ, and Al Dobbins on saxophone, performing in the Hurricane Club
